title: Agricultural Lending
description: Structure and performance of the agricultural lending industry. Advanced agricultural loan analysis and risk assessment. Agricultural loan documentation, securitization of farm loans, and farm bankruptcy. Exploration of interest rate impacts on agricultural lending. 4 lectures.
prerequisites: AGB 301; AGB 310; AGB 312; AGB 313; AGB 323; and one of the following AGB 327, AGB 328, AGB 405, AGB 421, AGB 422, AGB 433, AGB 435
